EXTRACTED VALUE: Civ: Rev is a great game, and I think most people will have a great time with this game, both online and offline.
The best thing about the gameplay is that it's all about reflex and intuition --accessible to all, but hard to master online competitive play.
Lost Odyssey brings back a traditional JRPG game style with some little additions, but nothing astounding.
t's a marvel to behold, a lot of fun, and the very pinnacle of WWII simulators.
A chaotic ride through the Marvel world. Exciting, fun and even moreso when you play with friends.
There is nothing that is insanely impossible in this game.
A wonderfully fun romp appropriate for all ages. If only it had a few more levels to experiment with all the elemental warriors.
A very impressive racer that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start line to finish.
Controls and presentation in Bad Company are phenomenal. It is incredibly easy to switch between weapons and items.
